subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The team is different from the one that got bounced out of the 2010 tournament in South Africa, and it no longer depends mostly on Lionel Messi, its biggest star.
snippet: The team is different from the one that got bounced out of the 2010 tournament in South Africa, and it no longer depends mostly on Lionel Messi, its biggest star.
